mapper.select: select r.*, CONCAT('(',u.name, ') ', c.company_name) as wUserInfo, u.profile_img as wUserProfileImg, p.project_name from review r join user u on r.w_user_id = u.user_id join project p on r.project_id = p.project_id join client c on c.client_id = u.user_id where r_user_id = #{freelancerId} order by create_date desc, review_id desc limit #{row}, 10
